title: PM Modi inaugurates 4th Global Renewable Energy Investor’s Meet and Expo (RE-INVEST) in Gandhinagar
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the 4th Global Renewable Energy Investor’s Meet and Expo in Gandhinagar. He highlighted the government's achievements in renewable energy and infrastructure development, emphasizing India's commitment to becoming a developed nation by 2047. Modi also discussed initiatives like the PM Surya Ghar Free Electricity Scheme and offshore wind energy projects.
